title: [52. N-Queens II](https://leetcode.cn/problems/n-queens-ii/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
52. N-Queens II Description The n-queens puzzle is the problem of placing n queens on an n x n chessboard such that no two queens attack each other.
Given an integer n, return the number of distinct solutions to the n-queens puzzle.
 
Example 1:
Input: n = 4 Output: 2 Explanation: There are two distinct solutions to the 4-queens puzzle as shown. Example 2:
Input: n = 1 Output: 1  
Constraints:
1 <= n <= 9 Related Topics Backtracking Similar Questions N-Queens
